title: Winter Olympics 2026: On a wild, wild evening of figure skating, Kagiyama Yuma, Sato Shun cap two
desc: Discover how the two boyhood friends are joined on the podium as Japan win two men's singles medals for the third consecutive Games. Kagiyama and Sato also felt for their friendly rival Ilia Malinin, who collapsed like he never has before to finish a shocking eighth place.

title: What’s new in Android's February 2026 Google System Updates [U]
desc: The monthly “Google System Release Notes” primarily detail what’s new in Play services, Play Store, and Play system update across...

title: Fox's 'Baywatch' Reboot Casts Stephen Amell to Lead Series
desc: Stephen Amell has been cast as Hobie Buchannon, a series regular lead role in the highly-anticipated 'Baywatch' reboot.

title: Atta saga: Red Notice ends after arrest – OSP official clarifies
desc: Director of the Strategy, Research, and Communication Division at the Office of the Special Prosecutor (OSP), Samuel Appiah Darko, has provided clarification on the workings of INTERPOL Red Notices, amid ongoing legal developments involving former Finance Minister Ken Ofori-Atta.

title: WA Coroner finds 'cascade of events' responsible for heart attack death of man arrested at Perth Underground Station
desc: A coronial inquest into the death of a 24-year-old man at a Perth train station finds the act of restraining him in a face-down position likely contributed to his death.

title: There's one common theme of agony for Team USA at these Olympics
desc: MILAN — The red, white and blue with disappointment. That has largely been the theme of the United States’ first week of the 2026 Winter Olympics.

title: Dozens of Australians diagnosed with rare tattoo
desc: Australian eye doctors have documented 40 cases of a rare tattoo-related eye inflammation that is hard to treat and can lead to vision loss.

title: Engineered Listeria boosts innate immunity against cancer
desc: After nearly 40 years of research on how Listeria bacteria manipulate our cells and battle our immune system to cause listeriosis, Daniel Portnoy and his colleagues have discovered a way to turn the bacteria into a potent booster of the immune system - and a potential weapon against cancer.

title: Penn State Dominates Ohio State, 36-5, In Battle of Nation’s Top Two Teams
desc: No. 1 Penn State dominates No. 2 Ohio State, 36-5, handing the Buckeyes their first loss of the season after a 17-0 start.
